hero.title:
Online intensive course by numerologist and
women's mentor Maria Kovalenko

description: Mariya Kovalenko is Practicing Vedic numerologist, astrologer, psychologist, and women's mentor.
Mother of three, happily married for 16 years
Received a blessing from a spiritual mentor to provide counseling and share knowledge
Author and organizer of women's circles and gatherings
Guest speaker at international festivals and women's events
Over 10 years of experience in supporting women's well-being

results.title: Your results after the "Resource" Intensive
list: You will stop snapping at your husband and children.
You will be able to dedicate time to yourself without sacrificing your family.
You will realize that your energy is directly linked to your income level.
You will begin attracting more opportunities and increasing your income without burnout.
You will stop earning at the cost of your health and nerves
You will learn to set personal boundaries effectively—without guilt.
You will stop giving all your energy to others and neglecting yourself.
You will learn to set personal boundaries effectively—without guilt.
You will understand where your energy goes and stop draining your strength.
You will stop putting off your dreams and start taking action.
You will reduce stress and anxiety using simple techniques.
You will eliminate accumulated fatigue and regain a sense of ease.
You will boost your overall energy levels and overcome chronic fatigue.

bonus.title: Bonus
checklist: Checklist : What Gives and What Drains Your Resource

1.name: Natalia
1.review: “I came to the intensive course in a state of complete emotional burnout. I had no energy for anything. After just the first lesson, I recognized my mistakes and started taking action. Now, I feel inspired and full of energy—my husband and children hardly recognize me. I’m happy, and I’ve already received a promotion at work.”

2.name: Yana
2.review: “Fatigue and apathy had become my normal state over the past few years. I didn’t even notice how I had fallen into this trap. But when I ended up in the hospital, I realized I couldn’t go on like this. I accidentally came across Maria’s intensive course, and it became my lifeline, opening my eyes. Maria explains everything in a very clear way. I finally found the strength to work on my project, and now I am the owner of my own business! But without this resource, I would never have achieved it.”

3.name: Regina
3.review: “I was on the verge of divorce, and my children were suffering, but I felt completely powerless—I had no motivation to work on my relationship. That’s when I found the "Resource" intensive course, and it came at just the right time. I regained my inner strength, and, surprisingly, my relationships improved on their own. It turned out that both my husband and children were struggling because I had no energy to give them—I was simply drained. Now, I follow the plan Maria helped me create, and I have plenty of energy for myself and my loved ones!”

4.name: Serafima
4.review: “I have 3 children and have been on maternity leave for the past 10 years. I was exhausted and drained because household chores, home, and family took up all my time. I didn’t even dare to dream about having my own business. I asked my husband for help, but he often refused. Thank God, I came across Maria’s intensive course. I still don’t understand why it’s so affordable because the information inside is worth a fortune! I finally figured out how to manage my energy, and now I don’t wait for a miracle—I create it myself. My children are no longer an obstacle; I’ve learned how to manage my time in a way that keeps me energized.”

5.name: Varia
5.review: “I felt lonely and unwanted. After the intensive course, I realized why—no one was interested in talking to me because all I did was complain about life. During the course, I understood that this was a dead-end road and decided to change my life according to a plan. Now, I have many new friends and have found a new job!”

6.name: Yuliia
6.review: “After the intensive course, my life will never be the same! I used to see happy women on social media and couldn’t understand how they managed it. Now, I’m one of them—I’ve created my own energy management plan and follow it (though sometimes with small detours, but I stay on track). Now, I replenish my energy in time, and I absolutely love it!”

7.name: Mila
7.review: “I felt that something needed to change in my life, but I had no idea what or how. I bought the intensive course, and I have no regrets—my perspective expanded, I changed my habits, and everything fell into place. I met the man of my dreams, and now we’re planning our wedding!”

Relevant and effective methods proven by experience.

Strong methodology built on 10 years of working with women.
Your results are important to me.

No practical and useful bonuses.
No specific step-by-step action plan.

works.title: What makes this intensive course work

list.title: There is a complete understanding of what the resource gives and what it takes away
list.p: You will determine your personal ways of filling the resource. After all, what is good for one is not suitable for another.

list.title: We remove resource holes
list.p: You can fill the resource from morning to night, but if there are holes, the resource will not accumulate, no matter how hard we try.

list.title: We write out a clear strategy
list.p: This is not just a theory where we talked and forgot - we will create a clear plan of simple actions that will not let you merge.

list.title: Fast feedback
list.p: I immediately sort out any questions that arise in a closed chat.

cheap.title: Why is this intensive course so cheap?
cheap.p1: I myself live by this strategy and enjoy the results of life in a calm, balanced state. This knowledge can be sold at a much higher price, but I sell it for only
cheap.p2: to make this knowledge available to the maximum number of women.
cheap.p3: is for as many women as possible to come to inner balance and be able to LIVE and enjoy every moment without stress and anxiety. And if you like everything and want to delve deeper into the topic of practice, then I will invite you to an energy workshop, where I will take you by the hand and lead you to the maximum possible result.

guarantee.title: Guarantee
guarantee.p1: If you take the intensive course and still have doubts about its effectiveness for you.
guarantee.p2: I will refund you the full cost of your training. Just write to the customer service and they will refund your money without any questions.

list.question: How does the intensive course go?
list.answer: The intensive course consists of five video lessons that you can watch at your convenience. Moreover, you will have access to all materials for 2 months. You will have a private chat for communication and support.
